roleset.name: to be typical of or sum up

example.name: transitive
example.text: Embittered shareholders ( some of whom [*T*-2] are suing ) say [0]the chairman and his collection epitomize the excesses of speculation that [] set off the national S & L crisis .
example.arg: excesses of speculation that [] set off the national S & L crisis

roleset.note: EPITOMIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'epitomize' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from epitomize.01-v predicate notes)
